article.excerpt: For those wondering 'why can't i lose weight' or working on the popular keto diet, find out what happens when you go keto and cut sugar and other carbs out of your diet.
article.title: 3 Things That Happen When You Cut Carbs
article.author: Maurice Beer M.D.
